languages.text: "Решил сделать исключение для Помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Императора, Глейто?" {n}Пес прижимает уши, ловя взгляд хозяина.{/n} "Ладно. Поздравляю с достижением, Вольный Торговец. Еще никому на моей памяти Глейто не позволял подобного".

"Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."
languages.original_text: "Решил сделать исключение для Помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Императора, Глейто?" {n}Пес прижимает уши, ловя взгляд хозяина.{/n} "Ладно. Поздравляю с достижением, Вольный Торговец. Еще никому на моей памяти Глейто не позволял подобного".

"Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

"Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

"Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

"Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

"Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下に選ばれた者には特別扱いをする気か、グライト？」{n}グライトは主人の視線を受けて、耳を伏せた。{/n}「いいだろう。おめでとうございます、ローグトレーダー。グライトが他人にこのようなことを許したのはこれが初めてです」
languages.original_text: "Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下に選ばれた者には特別扱いをする気か、グライト？」{n}グライトは主人の視線を受けて、耳を伏せた。{/n}「いいだろう。おめでとうございます、ローグトレーダー。グライトが他人にこのようなことを許したのはこれが初めてです」

languages.text: "Hast du beschlossen, für {mf|den Gesalbten|die Gesalbte} des Imperators eine Ausnahme zu machen, Glaito?" {n}Unter dem Blick seines Herren legt Glaito die Ohren an.{/n} "In Ordnung. Glückwunsch zu Eurem Erfolg, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das hat Glaito noch nie zuvor bei jemandem zugelassen."
languages.original_text: "Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

traits.locale_text: "Hast du beschlossen, für {mf|den Gesalbten|die Gesalbte} des Imperators eine Ausnahme zu machen, Glaito?" {n}Unter dem Blick seines Herren legt Glaito die Ohren an.{/n} "In Ordnung. Glückwunsch zu Eurem Erfolg, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das hat Glaito noch nie zuvor bei jemandem zugelassen."

languages.text: « Tu as décidé de faire une exception pour l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, Glaito ? {n}Glaito cligne des yeux en regardant son maître.{/n} « Soit. Félicitations pour cet exploit, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. C'est la première fois que Glaito accepte un tel geste. »
languages.original_text: "Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

traits.locale_text: « Tu as décidé de faire une exception pour l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, Glaito ? {n}Glaito cligne des yeux en regardant son maître.{/n} « Soit. Félicitations pour cet exploit, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. C'est la première fois que Glaito accepte un tel geste. »

languages.text: «¿Has decidido hacer una excepción con {mf|el elegido|la elegida} del Emperador, Glaito?». {n}Glaito agacha las orejas bajo la atenta mirada de su amo.{/n} «Muy bien. Le felicito por su hazaña, Comerciante Independiente. Glaito nunca le había permitido a nadie hacer eso».
languages.original_text: "Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

traits.locale_text: «¿Has decidido hacer una excepción con {mf|el elegido|la elegida} del Emperador, Glaito?». {n}Glaito agacha las orejas bajo la atenta mirada de su amo.{/n} «Muy bien. Le felicito por su hazaña, Comerciante Independiente. Glaito nunca le había permitido a nadie hacer eso».

languages.text: “你这是决定为帝皇的神选者破个例吗？”{n}在索罗蒙的注视下，格雷托垂下了耳朵。{/n}“好吧，恭喜你实现了伟大的成就，行商浪人。格雷托以前从来没允许任何人这么做过。”
languages.original_text: "Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

traits.locale_text: “你这是决定为帝皇的神选者破个例吗？”{n}在索罗蒙的注视下，格雷托垂下了耳朵。{/n}“好吧，恭喜你实现了伟大的成就，行商浪人。格雷托以前从来没允许任何人这么做过。”

languages.text: "İmparator'un kutsanmışına bir ayrıcalık mı tanımaya karar verdin Glaito?" {n}Glaito, efendisinin bakışları altında kulaklarını indiriyor.{/n} "Peki. Tebrik ederim Hür Tacir. Glaito kimseye bu denli müsamaha göstermemiştir."
languages.original_text: "Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."

languages.original_text: "Have you decided to make an exception for the Emperor's anointed, Glaito?" {n}Glaito puts his ears down under his master's gaze.{/n} "Fine. Congratulations on your achievement, Rogue Trader. Glaito has never allowed anyone to do that before."
